reviews.review_text: Aces of the Galaxy is a vibrant rail shooter. The gameplay is very accessible and combat is hectic, and enjoyable. The difficulty levels feel pretty appropriate, however there is even a challenge on Easy mode.   The biggest complaint I have, whether by design or not, is that there is no save state for progression. Every time you exit the game, you and return, you'll start right over. Now this could be an homage to the classic arcade style that this game represents, but for most modern arcade games, a save system is really a requirement I feel. Not having the ability to continue is why I would not recommend this game.

Cant really recommend this game. Gameplay is repetative and uninteresting and the controls are hit and miss. looks and sound are good enough, but the game isnt worth your money, there are free flash games out there that are better then this
